response.original_title: Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About That! Amazing Animals!
response.overview: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Follows the adventures of 6-year-old best friends, Sally and Nick, as they are whisked off on extraordinary voyages of scientific discovery with the Cat in the Hat. Thanks to the Thinga-ma-jigger and our friends, exploring has never been more exciting! So let s go, go, go, go on an adventure, we re flying with The Cat in the Hat today!
response.title: Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About That! Amazing Animals!
